about_the_game:
One day, Reginald receives a concussion, causing him to get into a coma. When he regains consciousness, he has amnesia. Although he doesn't remember anything, all he knows is that there are four loyal henchmen by his side. Later, he finds out that he's a ringleader of a criminal organization, which makes him wonder what would lead him to assassinate various high-profile figures in the past. Wanting to repent, he decides to do good deeds along with his henchmen. But unfortunately, Reginald's past will haunt him. From being a ringleader who'd carried out assassinations in the past, now he's the one who's being targeted.

The character you play as.

Despite being a levelheaded gentleman, Reginald is very superstitious, so much so that he checks his fortune on a shady website every morning. A fortune teller once told him that names that end with the alphabet 'i' when written in English would bring him luck. Now he's adamant about being called Regi.

Jinhai, the thief, is a master of stealth and distraction and can steal anything before your eyes. He can crack a safe in mere seconds. Jinhai is pretty laid back, so he just wants to relax and have fun. He's constantly seeking his boss' attention.

Sergei, the chemist, develops poisons that are untraceable yet lethal. He has vast knowledge about various chemicals and medicine. Sergei is very sweet and gentle. Although he specializes in chemical weapons, there's nothing toxic about his personality. He respects his boss very much.

Giovanni, the hitman, is a skilled fighter. Whether it be using swords, guns, or fists, he can defeat his opponent with ease. Giovanni might come across as quiet and aloof, but he likes to look after people. His wish is to protect the person he cares about the most, so he'll do everything he can to protect his boss.

Mizuki, the hacker, is a young genius when it comes to working with technology. He's a nerd who works or plays games all night, so he's usually tired during the afternoon. All he wants is to be useful to his boss. Getting praised by his boss makes him very happy.

- - Around 65K Words!

- 5 Love Interests

- Map Exploration

- Mini-game

This game is more about bonds than romance

Mentions blood, homicide, trauma, and self-harm

short_description: Reginald is a ringleader of a criminal organization who'd received a concussion and lost his memories. When he finds out that he has committed crimes in the past, he wants to repent and do good deeds. He wants to convince his henchmen to change with him. Unfortunately, he can't escape his past.
